name: infected
content:
infected adjective
(DISEASE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a person or animal) affected by an organism that can cause disease: Scientists believe people died after eating meat from infected cattle. 20 million Americans became infected with the influenza and more than 500,000 died.
(of a substance, object, etc.) containing bacteria or other organisms that can cause disease: The virus can be spread through sexual contact and infected needles. After the operation the wound became infected.
More examplesFewer examplesRabies is a viral disease that spreads when an infected animal bites another animal or a human.The parasites enter the bloodstream when an infected mosquito bites a human.75 people became infected with Campylobacter bacteria from drinking unpasteurized milk.Some medical personnel contracted hepatitis C from infected blood.The plague had been raging in the city and the rivers were still infected.
